I heard one may only make Dua in ARABIC in the sajda?s of Nafl salaah only. 2) If alcohol is NOT derived from Grapes or Dates but rather derived from any other fuit or even ANIMAL extracted but it?s end result within a certain product (eg. ANSWER


Share:

2. If a product used for external use has alcohol from fruits other than grapes or dates, then it is permissible. We are not aware of alcohol from animals.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
